DIA_Prawus_Hello_15_00: Hey, what are you doing here?
DIA_Prawus_Hello_14_01: I drink dog piss because there's nothing else this flea hole offers.
DIA_Prawus_Hello_14_02: What the hell do you care about that, punk?
DIA_Prawus_BetterDrink_15_00: How about I buy you something better?
DIA_Prawus_BetterDrink_14_01: Well, I'll gladly drink some more, hehe.
DIA_Prawus_BetterDrink_14_02: Just bring me something strong enough to turn my mouth inside out.
DIA_Prawus_BetterDrink_15_03: I'll try to find something like that.
DIA_Prawus_BlackTroll_14_02: That looks like even more piss to me than the booze I just downed.
DIA_Prawus_BlackTroll_14_03: You're not kidding me, are you?
DIA_Prawus_BlackTroll_15_04: This is the strongest drink I've found, I guarantee it. It's called Black Troll.
DIA_Prawus_BlackTroll_14_05: Oh shit... ahh... it's twisting the face first class!
DIA_Prawus_BlackTroll_14_06: All right, well... thanks for the round, now get out of here because I have things to do. Hahah!
DIA_Prawus_YouHaveProblem_15_00: I might have overheard, but one of those guys said something about you.
DIA_Prawus_YouHaveProblem_15_02: The guy over there in the corner said your face looks like you're the son of a molerat and a scavenger.
DIA_Prawus_YouHaveProblem_15_03: He also mentioned something about how he'd love to chop you up with a pickaxe.
DIA_Prawus_YouHaveProblem_14_04: No punk will insult my mama and papa!
DIA_Prawus_YouHaveProblem_14_05: I'll turn him inside out with a right hook!
DIA_Prawus_YouHaveProblem_14_06: I'm just gonna give myself a good gulp first...
DIA_Prawus_HelpMe_15_00: Can you help me get rid of these 3 drunks?
DIA_Prawus_HelpMe_15_01: You look like a strongman to me, and I can't do it alone.
DIA_Prawus_HelpMe_14_02: I don't care what they do. I don't want to.
DIA_Prawus_AfterFight_14_00: Nothing like a little fight after a few drinks.
DIA_Prawus_AfterFight_14_02: Don't you still have some of that whole Troll thing?
DIA_Prawus_AfterFight_15_03: Unfortunately, that was the last bottle.
DIA_Prawus_AfterFight_14_04: Oh, shit. So I have to go back to drinking that nasty beer.
DIA_Prawus_Ambient_03_01: Instead of yapping in my ear, make yourself useful and bring me a booze or two.
DIA_Prawus_Ambient_03_02: Make it quick or I'll get nasty!
DIA_Prawus_YouHaveProblem_Choice: One of those guys said something about you.
DIA_Prawus_HelpMe_Choice: Can you help me get rid of these 3 drunks?
